name: X8X
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: Finally, Securing Value in Crypto is simple. Obtain your own X8X Tokens, that grant you a fair value exchange and 0% fee for issuing X8Currency, a 100% fiat & gold backed Token. Become the next gatekeeper!
